thread.title: Two to appear for the killing of Etwatwa twins
thread.title_full: Two to appear for the killing of Etwatwa twins | News24

author: news24.com
title: Two to appear for the killing of Etwatwa twins
text:
Johannesburg - Two people arrested for the brutal killing of twin brothers who were necklaced in Etwatwa in the East Rand were expected to appear in the Daveyton Magistrate's Court on Monday.
The brothers, Sabelo and Samkelo Mayisela were laid to rest in a massive funeral on Sunday.
Ekurhuleni Metro Police Department spokesperson Clifford Shongwe told News24 that the arrest of one of the suspects, a 53-year-old man, was a big break through.
The man had been sought by police since the violence started and is believed to preside over cases where a self-appointed anti-crime group takes action against people it believes have committed crimes, bypassing the criminal justice system.
